title: IExtrudeFeatureData2.NormalCut
description: Gets or sets whether the cut is created normal to the thickness of the sheet metal part.
returns: True if the cut is created normal to the thickness of the sheet metal part, false if not
remarks:
To optimize the geometry of the normal cut in the sheet metal part, set
IExtrudeFeatureData2::OptimizeGeometry
to true.
